ThingDef.label: kimchi
ThingDef.description:
Kimchi is a traditional dish made by fermenting vegetables with a mix of seasonings like chili pepper, garlic, ginger, and fish sauce.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 kimchi requires cabbage and spices for a total value of 35.20, and sells for 8, giving a <color=#33CC33>56%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 1000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.08</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.2 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>40</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.39</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
